freeReading.title: Try a Free Tarot Reading
freeReading.subtitle: Get instant insight into your past, present, and future with our popular 3-card spread. No registration required.

features.title: Discover the Worlds Within
features.subtitle: After registering, you'll gain access to a suite of mystical tools to illuminate your path. Discover what the stars have in store for you.

tarot.title: Tarot Readings
tarot.description: Gain insight with various card spreads, from past, present, and future to complex life questions.

coffee.title: Coffee Ground Reading
coffee.description: Decipher the symbols in your coffee cup and unveil messages about your future and inner self.

dream.title: Dream Interpretation
dream.description: Explore the hidden meanings of your dreams and understand what your subconscious is trying to tell you.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.description: Discover the power of numbers and how your birth date and name influence your life path and personality.

dashboard.noReadings: You haven't done any readings yet.

noResults.body: There are no readings that match your search criteria.

tarotChoice.title: Choose a Tarot Spread
tarotChoice.subtitle: Each spread offers a unique perspective on your questions.

coffee.title: Coffee Ground Reading
coffee.uploadTitle: Upload a photo of your cup
coffee.uploadDesc: Let the AI find the symbols for you.
tips: Take a photo directly from above.
Rotate the cup a few times for different angles.
coffee.clickToUse: Click on the symbols you want to use for your reading.

dream.title: Dream Interpretation
dream.describe: Describe your dream in as much detail as possible. What happened? Who was there? How did you feel?

numerology.title: Numerology Reading
numerology.discover: Discover your life path, destiny, and soul numbers by entering your full name and date of birth.
